summary: pre-HCT and weekly post-HCT nasal washes and symptom surveys were collected through day 100, then every 3 months. samples were tested by multiplex semi-quantitative PCR for RSV, parainfluenza virus 1–4, influenza A/B, adenovirus, human metapneumovirus, rhinovirus, coronavirus. all 6 cases presented with hypoxemia, 4 had significant respiratory copathogens. no death was attributed mainly to BoV lower RTI.
